## Who

I am an analytical-empirical social scientist. I hold a PhD and an MA in Sociology.

## What

My research is on social inequality with a special focus on wealth inequality and family-related topics.

## Where

I work as a senior researcher at [GESIS - Leibniz Institute for the Social Sciences](https://www.gesis.org/home) in Mannheim, Germany.
